attachments.title: Over 18,000 fans have signed an online petition to stop Phil Simms from doing Broncos games
attachments.text: Lots of people do not like Phil Simms as a broadcaster. (Like the 14,000 people who follow a Twitter account devoted to mocking his analysis.) Well, Broncos fans are particularly displeased with the...
attachments.fallback: SI.com: Over 18,000 fans have signed an online petition to stop Phil Simms from doing Broncos games

text: hey <@U026PLK4S> - don't be embarrassed. Chris Collinsworth is the worst broadcaster in the history of television as far as I'm concerned
i just signed this
Simms is a real piece of shit
he literally said — at one point in the game — "I'm not sitting here rooting for the Kansas City Chiefs, but..."
HAHAH
i think it's because he hates Elway, and because his son used to back-up Cutler at QB and he then they cut his ass
and becasue he DESTROYED the broncos in the Super Bowl, but nobody gives him any love.
Well Collinsworth was up against Bradshaw during the glory years

So I understand where you're coming from
plus I think he's just sad cause he's not Boomer Esiason
also he blew a superbowl by fumbling
usually Collisworth doesn't directly shit on people/teams as much as he just absolutely, jocks random guys and teams. Gruden is really bad at that too. "THIS GUY DEFINES THE NATIONAL FOOTBALL LEAGUE"
I miss local color commentary

National level commentary has been in a race to the bottom like that for years
its so bland
Couple that with me having basically NO IDEA who plays for the steelers these days, and its a losing proposition
hah. i just want the stadium PA and more "on-field" mics

that's why Hard Knocks is the best

and it was choice

and NHL players are just 1000x cooler than any other pro athletes
fact.
I remember the moment in my life when i realized this. I was 8 years old at a penguins game and two dudes before the puck dropped just said "you wanna go?"
and the moment the whistle blew they fought like crazy
They didn't even seem angry at all
They just DGAF
when HBO does the 24/7 for the winter classic, or whatever it's called, it really shows just how awesome those dudes are.
